extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations for RV160, RV260, RV340, and RV345 Series Routers.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2022-20827, CVE-2022-20841, or CVE-2022-20842?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to the Latest Firmware Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade affected routers to the latest firmware version available to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

affected_products: RV160 and RV260 Series Routers: version >= 1.0.01.05 and < 1.0.01.09
RV340 and RV345 Series Routers: version >= 1.0.03.26 and < 1.0.03.28
RV340 and RV345 Series Routers: version 1.0.03.26 and earlier until 1.0.03.27
